paypayNote: Uses personal PayPay payment link. Payment confirmation must be done manually. The link has an expiration period (14 days), so please update it as needed.
stripeNote: Uses Stripe payment link. Payment confirmation must be done manually.
leaveBlankToKeepCurrent: Leave blank to keep current value
defaultPaymentMethodsDescription: Select payment methods to use when creating events via LINE. Multiple selections are allowed.
cashPaymentDescription: Set whether to display cash payment as an option on the payment page.
